DescriptionData.Title: Slush! Magic Tricks With Slush Powder
DescriptionData.Description: Slush Powder lets you do the impossible! Along with information on using Slush Powder, this book contains step-by-step instructions for many miraculous Slush Powder effects, including how to turn a glass of milk into a white silk, vanish a bowl of water, change a glass of water into a snowstorm of confetti, and more. 32-page, illustrated paperback
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes information on slush powder and step-by-step instructions for slush powder effects
Essential tips for clowns and entertainers of all levels
